definition: memorial to the emperor (folded in accordion form)
to play music/to achieve/to present a memorial to the emperor (old)
to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
variant of 折[zhe2]/to fold

sentences.english: His greatest professional achievements are in establishing the Grand Council and perfecting Communications System.
sentences.chinese: 他最大的职业成就是规划建立军机处及完善奏折制度。

sentences.english: Is also say, Manchu Court to wood then slowly of the memorial haven't made a reaction.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，清廷对林则徐的奏折尚未作出反应。

sentences.english: Therefore, even in writing a memorial, the ancients tried to make it rich and bright.
sentences.chinese: 因而即便是写奏折，古人也尽可能地写得文采斐然。
